name: CodeWordConfidence
description:
Unimoon Media proudly presents a game developed in under 24 hours: Code Word Confidence.

As a woman in STEM, I've known the struggle of lacking confidence. I've faced my fears of not measuring up in comparison to my peers, and I've learned many lessons from failure. I wanted to make a game that could teach minority programmers the best way to approach the hiring process and boost their confidence in their programming abilities. I also wanted to lend an outside perspective to those for whom applications and interviews may come naturally. If you fit any of these categories, play Code Word Confidence!
